current_creative_message: Hot & comfy: women bras now 20% off — feel the difference.

creative_variations.headline: Experience Ultimate Comfort All Day Long
creative_variations.message: Breathable, ultra-soft undergarments designed for active lifestyles. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to confidence.
creative_variations.reasoning: Emotional appeal to comfort addresses core product benefit. Low CTR suggests generic messaging needs differentiation.

creative_variations.headline: Premium Quality - Now 30% Off
creative_variations.message: High-quality materials at unbeatable prices. Limited-time offer on our best-selling comfort collection. Free shipping over $50.
creative_variations.reasoning: Value-conscious messaging with specific discount percentage. Price mentions typically increase CTR.

creative_variations.headline: Flash Sale Ends Tonight at Midnight
creative_variations.message: Don't miss your chance to upgrade your essentials. Premium undergarments at prices that won't last. Limited stock available.
creative_variations.reasoning: Creates time pressure to drive immediate action. Urgency-based creatives achieve higher CTR during promotions.
